name: The Crootures
description:
Take charge of the zoo with cute Crootures. Treat them well and get a chance to discover a new species of these beautiful creatures. You start the game with the roots of the Crootures kind! See if you can unlock all the Crootures population! Do not relax, this won't be easy.

How to:

  • Just drag & drop Crootures to move them around the room;
  • Drop one to another to start mating, be sure they have all they want;
  • Drop on feeder or couch to force interact with items;
  • Do not forget to check the tree of species to know how to get new Crooters.
  • Do not forget to feed your creatures (drop a Crooter on the feeder)
  • Drop an item in the sell zone to sell it

Made for GGJ 2023
